text: Keiten'notami no naka ni mo, arrā o shinkō shi, anata gata ni kudasa reta mono to kare-ra ni kudasa reta mono o shinjite, arrā ni kenkyo ni tsukae, wazukana daika de arrā no keiji o uttari shinai mono ga iru. Korera no mono ni wa, arrā no omoto de hōshō ga arou. Hontōni arrā wa seisan ni jinsokude ara reru
